Give the gift of nature

Hug a tree today and you can help save the world of tomorrow. We need your help to protect our forests.

At a glance

  • Founded: 1901
  • Staff: 2
  • Founder: Jolie Ko
  • Office HQ: Landover, Washington
  • Ultimate Vision: To revitalize the woodlands.
